title: Act Like a Radiologist: Radiology Report Generation across Anatomical Regions
details: Q Chen, Y Xie, B Wu, X Chen, J Ang, MS To, X Chang… - Proceedings of the Asian …, 2024
abstract: Automating radiology report generation can ease the reporting workload for radiologists. However, existing works focus mainly on the chest area due to the limited availability of public datasets for other regions. Besides, they often rely on …
